description: Nobody knows snow like the fine folks of South Dakota, so there's nobody you can trust with your refreshing frozen treats like Dakota Snow!These Sioux Falls fellows are scooping up sweet icy confections that are as whimsically colorful as the truck itself. Feel free to flavor your creation with any of your favorites; Peppermint, Root Beer, Toffee, Blue Raspberry, or Cotton Candy. Speaking of candy, you can even give your treat an extra kick with Skittles, or Sprinkles, or Sour Patch Kids. So for your next shaved ice experience, where do you go? Well, of course it’s Dakota Snow, don’tcha know?
name: Dakota Snow
